name: Baked French Toast
author: ANTLALA
summary: I got this recipe from my sister in law. She and my brother had it at their gift opening after the wedding. I make it any time we have people staying with us, and it is always a hit. You may sprinkle the top with pecans if you wish.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf French bread, cut diagonally in 1 inch slices
directions: Arrange the slices of bread in the bottom
In a large bowl, beat together eggs, milk, cream, vanilla and cinnamon
Pour over bread slices, cover, and refrigerate overnight
The next morning, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a small saucepan, combine butter, brown sugar and corn syrup; heat until bubbling
Pour over bread and egg mixture
Bake in preheated oven, uncovered, for 40 minutes
